i didnt play coop so im not gonna talk about it 

this game is really good, its filled with good jokes and the gameplay is amazing and fun. Story wise this is alot more in your face then portal 1 where it was more a mystery that you had to piece together. i prefer portal 1  because it leaves a bigger memory because it was such a mystery (if that makes sence). 

this game is longfer than portal 1 which i prefer, but i feel like it does get a little bit tedious especially at chapter 6 and 7. the puzzles are way harder which i prefer also. 

so my verdict is portal 1 is better and also onw of my favourite games of all time, but this game is also really fucking good so you should buy both

[h1]10/10[/h1]

Classic puzzle platformer which allows you to have fun breaking all the laws of quantum physics while collaborating with/competing against a mad AI in a defunct laboratory. And should you find yourself alone, something that will happen very often in the story, you can always go to enjoy the game with a friend in a distinct co-op campaign.
